physDesc.additional: Lines per folio: 7; 8 on fol. 4a. Orthography: - Palatalization of m (e.g., dmyigs, myed, mying) pa/ba takes the form ba after final –n (e.g., bstan ba) and often after –s (e.g., thos ba) - Frequent alternance of pa and ba (which are, further, not always clearly distinguishable) - tu/du takes the form du after final –g (e.g., mchog du) - kyi/gyi/gi takes the form gyi after final –b (e.g., shes rab gyi) - la stsogs pa and la.sogs pa (for la sogs pa) (not systematic) - log par rtogs pa (for log par rtog pa) - dam 'cha for dam bca’ - Occasional use of the bindu for m

body.ab: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po rgya cher bshad pa 'di'i don bsdus pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste | ngag dang po'i don dang | mdo'i lus rnam par gzhag ba dang | yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang | yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o ||

bkodb(k)od pa'i dgos pa ni | nges pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang | don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gis 'jug pa dang | gzhan gi log par rtogs pa spang ba gsum bzhag nas | gzhung mdzes par bya ba yin no || zhes skabs gzhan ‹du›du gtan la phab pa bzhin du shes par bya'o ||

'on kyang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya bas gtsor brjod pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa
dang dngos nyid du yin ba dang | rtogs pa ma yin ‹par›par slob dpon gzhan gis bshad pa bzhin blta ste | 'dir ni cung zad nor par bshad pa yin no ||

kha ci‹g›cig las las kyi bdud dang lngar gsungs ba der ni nyon mongs pa dang las gnyi gas phung po lhaglha‹g› ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar‹ba›r du gcod pa'i
phyir ro ||
shes rab snying po'i rgya cher 'grel gi bshad pa | lo tsa ba slob dpon blo ldan shes rab kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho ||||
